info.author: Dan Gass
info.description:
cfgparse is a more convenient, flexible, and powerful module for parsing
configuration files than the standard library ConfigParser module. cfgparse uses
a more declarative style modelled after the popular optparse standard library
module.

cfgparse can optionally cooperate with the optparse module to provide
coordination between command line and configuration file options. In addition,
the cooperation can be used to allow the user to control features of the parser
from the command line.
info.name: cfgparse.py
info.html_description:
cfgparse is a more convenient, flexible, and powerful module for parsing configuration files than the standard library ConfigParser module. cfgparse uses a more declarative style modelled after the popular optparse standard library module.

cfgparse can optionally cooperate with the optparse module to provide coordination between command line and configuration file options. In addition, the cooperation can be used to allow the user to control features of the parser from the command line.
